Simple Project Documentation
============================

Welcome to the **Simple Sphinx-Needs Demo** documentation.

Project: A small Python app to add and subtract numbers.

Requirements
------------

.. req:: Add numbers correctly
   :id: REQ_001
   :status: open
   :tags: math, addition
   :author: Ganesh

   The program should return the correct sum of two numbers.

.. req:: Subtract numbers correctly
   :id: REQ_002
   :status: open
   :tags: math, subtraction
   :author: Ganesh

   The program should return the correct difference of two numbers.

Specifications
--------------

.. spec:: Addition function
   :id: SPEC_001
   :status: in_progress
   :links: REQ_001

.. spec:: Subtraction function
   :id: SPEC_002
   :status: in_progress
   :links: REQ_002

   Implement function `subtract(a, b)` in Python.

Test Cases

.. test:: Test addition
   :id: TEST_001

.. test:: Test subtraction
   :id: TEST_002

   :links: SPEC_002
